entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
